analysis: The project is a website about black holes with existing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. The current theme needs to be enhanced with a cosmic, dark theme featuring animations related to black holes, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The existing files have some incomplete sections and pending tasks related to styling and functionality.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.

Complete the JavaScript content to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality, including the mobile menu toggle functionality with smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions.
